name: 蔡榮發
objective:
引導學生觀察及掌握不同產業的技術與市場發展趨勢，培養學生對於產業技術及市場之前瞻思考能力，協助學生整合產業趨勢及市場前瞻相關領域的專業知識，有助於學生儘早熟悉產業生態，提高其就業競爭力。
To guide students in observing and handling the different industry and market trends, training students for industry technology and foresights, to helps students consolidate expertise in areas related to industry trends and market perspectives. This course will help students as early as possible familiar with the industry, to improve their employability.
